Subskills.name: Demonic Effect
Subskills.description: Increases impale area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Hunger Of The Demon
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple smaller impales in an arc.

Subskills.name: Unseen Strike
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical damage.

Subskills.name: Hell's Ascension
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional impale on hit.

Subskills.name: Blood Shedding Impale
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Bonemagi
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of impale.

Subskills.name: Spear Of Amaymon
Subskills.description: Impale becomes a piercing bone projectile you throw. Each enemy it catches is impaled and travels along with the projectile until it hits terrain stunning attached enemies.

Subskills.name: Impaling Flames
Subskills.description: Chance to light the ground on fire on hit.

Subskills.name: Shattering Impale
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Spiked Fields
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the area of effect radius of impale.

Subskills.name: Elemental Bone Magister
Subskills.description: Impale inflicts stasis, bleeding and burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Via Dolorosa
Subskills.description: Impale now travels forward in a pathway increasing in size and damage until reaching its end stunning monsters it hits.
